introduction: Description: The time was during the Meiji Restoration when everything was in disorder.Gonnosuke is a cold-blood businessman who made fortune by buying farmers' estates for cheap price. He rapes Fusa (Ami Takadori), a maid. Fusa gets pregnant. She is tied up and gets torture from Gonnosuke. She commits suicide by biting of her tongue.Gonnosuke's next target is a young maid, Yuki(Rie Nakano). Trying to escape from Gonnosuke, Yuki throws herself to a river. Two villagers, Tomekichi and Sutezo, rescue her. Sharing the same poor situation, Tomikich and Yuki, travel together, but Yuki gets caught and brought back to Gonnosuke. Gonnosuke hits her with a 6-feet long wood stick and kills her awfully. Tomekichi and Sutezo hear about Yuki's death and decide to avenge her.Many torture scenes of killing women are so gruesome.This sadistic and erotic film is from Koji Wakamatsu, an opinion leader of the adult movie industry in 60's and 70's, who created many sensational movies with anti-authority and anti-society messages.
